paper.title: Diameter, width, closest line pair, and parametric searching

paper.abstract: We apply Megiddou0027s parametric searching technique to several geometric optimization problems and derive significantly improved solutions for them. We obtain, for any fixed ?u003e0, anO(n1+?) algorithm for computing the diameter of a point set in 3-space, anO(8/5+?) algorithm for computing the width of such a set, and onO(n8/5+?) algorithm for computing the closest pair in a set ofn lines in space. All these algorithms are deterministic.
